name: Geese And Gats
description:
Are you ready to take on the battle gaggle?

Geese and Gats is a round based survival game where the objective is to make your way through endless wave of battle geese.

Variety of Weapons. Different gats for every type of player.

Destructible environment. Take a break from the geese and destroy the environment. Every structure on the snowy mountain top is destructible.

Single player. Relax while wading your way through armed geese with no competition.

No Pay-To-Win model. There are no in-game purchases and no season pass. You get everything right out of the box.
